html: A beautiful funerary portrait on a mummy shroud from Antinoe of an individual dubbed Ammonios, ca. Mid-3rd Century AD. Heavily restored, but the piece retains the original control of framing. #Archaeology #Art\n\nImage: Louvre Collections (P 215). Link - https://t.co/Cyimzs7juU https://t.co/3O8cbxV9UP
